modName: The First National Blood Bank of Skyrim
summary: Why do being a crazy evil menace and being bloodsucking fiend (Vampires, not lawyers) always have to go hand in hand. Well now they don\'t, in an awesome way. LORE-FRIENDLY!
descriptionHtml:
V 1.0
Description
===========
Haven\'t you ever wanted to pull an Angel and not go on killing sprees for blood, yeah me neither,
but still now you can.This mod adds something quite smart, and even lore friendly, while still 
being slightly amusing, a blood bank. The Jarls of Skyrim have all agreed to invest in a blood 
bank in an effort to \\keep the vampires well fed and docile. The blood bank has its own crime 
faction, or at least thats what a little dolfin told me..

Location
========
The blood bank is located in the mining village right outside Markarth and has its own 
map-marker. (Fast-travel to the doorstep is possible after discovering it for the first time)

Details
=======
This allows many things:
- The ability to play a good vampire
- The ability to grow in strength without committing a felony
- The ability to hang out in a place of your own kind
- The ability to go all self righteous/crazy and kill everyone insight. 
(No re-spawns/essentials)

Install
=======
A:
1. Download and extract from archive.
2. Place esp into the data folder in your Skyrim file. 
(Usually: Computer/OS(C:)/Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim
OR
B:
1. Download with nexus mod manager
2. Find in Mods tab and double click/press enter

Uninstall
=========
- Delete the esp from the data folder
OR
- Double click/press enter on mod name in the Mods tab (in NMM)


Incompatibility
===============
This may conflict with anything changes the mining settlement outside Markarth, or the blood potion,
as a modified version of the blood potion is sold. But it is fully NAVMESHED and compatible with 
dragon attacks.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
No known bugs or issues, please report if found or you make innocent bunnies suffer...

History
=======
1.0, 2013/02/18 - Initial release with bank, custom guards and crime faction.

Contact
=======
For small things you can comment and I will get back to you within 48 hours.
For big/unrelated things you can email me here: epic_cat@mail.com. (I do prefer to be asked permission to use my mod, 
but as long as you credit me...)

Credits
=======

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to Skyrim.Nexusmods.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to cats for being awesome.
author: VampireRights
